topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Deploying the Non-KVM Region

body.p: The first phase of the HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade installation involves editing Ansible playbooks, which are files that contain scripts that execute required installation processes.

section.title: Prepare the system for deployment
section.p: Use the following steps to prepare the server on which the HLM VM will be deployed (the HLM host):

ol.li: Log into the HLM host using the default credentials

Edit the /root/infra-ansible-playbooks/group_vars/all file for your environment. For information on each variable, refer to the comments in the file with each variable.
The group_vars/all file should appear similar to the following for a KVM + ESX deployment: ############################################# Variables for HLM ################################################################# #These variables are relevant in both All Virtual and BareMetal scenarios.
#Set this to 1 if you will not deploy a dcn cloud via this HLM node and will deploy only ovs cloud ovs_cloud_only: 0
#Set this to 'bm' if cloud is being deployed over baremetal. #Set this to 'av' if the cloud is all virtual cloud_type: 'bm'
#These are hlm related variables that must be changed according to your Baremetal Env hlm_login_id: root hlm_password: cghelion
#The following variables are for CLM network IP details for HLM hlm_clmstaticip: 10.20.x.x hlm_clmnetmask: 255.255.255.0 hlm_clmgateway: 10.20.x.x
#The variables starting with cobbler_ are inputs that are usually given to initcobbler.sh. Set accordingly. cobbler_pxestartip: 10.20.x.x cobbler_pxeendip: 10.20.x.x cobbler_pxestaticip: 10.20.x.x cobbler_pxenetmask: 255.255.255.0
#Set the location of your images that will be used by libvirt imagelocation: /var/lib/libvirt/images
#Set the location of your infra-ansible-playbooks ansible_dir: ~/infra-ansible-playbooks
